thread.title: Donald Trump Demands Apology From Intelligence Agencies, Media Over Dossier
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Demands Apology From Intelligence Agencies, Media Over Dossier

title: Donald Trump Demands Apology From Intelligence Agencies, Media Over Dossier
text:
Donald Trump Demands Apology From Intelligence Agencies, Media Over Dossier Trump tweets comments made by veteran journalist Bob Woodward during talk show Sunday By Harriet Torry Jan 15, 2017 6:38 pm ET 
President-elect Donald stoked his spat with U.S. intelligence agencies and the media on Sunday, demanding an apology for presenting a dossier containing unverified allegations of Russian influence. Mr. Trump tweeted comments made by veteran journalist Bob Woodward during a talk show Sunday, in which the Watergate reporter described the unverified dossier prepared by an ex-British [â€¦]
